name: Raniolo's Dinner
description:
Raniolo is HUNGRY!
Help him to catch its favorite food...  Fireflies

Catch them when their light is big and yellow, if it is too red they will burn your tongue, and decrease your fullness.

Controls:

-Left click to eat fireflies

If you feel brave enough, you can hold your mouse and fireflies will go quicker, avoid the red ones.

Be careful! If you don't eat fireflies for too long, your fullness will decrease quicker and Raniolo will starve!

Time:

2 hours and 55 min of Development by Regoli

2 hours and 45 min of Art by itslizzyart
